short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automating the creation of job seekers for recruiters, using LinkedIn profiles!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add job seekers from LinkedIn to your Tribepad Applicant Tracking System (ATS) at the click of a button.

No need to manually enter or copy details into your ATS, simply use our extension when viewing the job seekers LinkedIn profile. This makes it quicker, easier and more cost effective to find and engage with the best talent. All whilst keeping things simple and pain free for candidates.

How it works:

If you have access to the job seekers email address via LinkedIn (e.g. they are a first degree connection or you have a LinkedIn license) then this will be used to create their record in your ATS. If not then they’ll still be created using the information available and searchable within your talent pool, plus it'll save a link to their profile so you can find them again.

To get started, just enter your specific organisation API key (you can request one from our support team) into the settings page to get started. You’ll also have access to a history page to show all of your past imports and their LinkedIn and ATS profiles.

Tribepad is the easiest-to-use enterprise talent acquisition platform. It empowers organisations to build powerfully straightforward experiences that continually transform their recruitment. 

Only Tribepad combines robust functionality with profound usability. Used by 25-million people in 16 languages, Tribepad helps enterprises attract, source, nurture, screen, interview and onboard the right people (employees and contractors).
